channel.title: Bio on Laurence Vincent
channel.description: Recent content in Bio on Laurence Vincent

item.title: About Larry
item.description: Laurence Vincent is the Chief Branding Officer of United Talent Agency. An award-winning writer and veteran brand strategist, he has developed strategies for many leading brands, including Disney, Mattel, Microsoft, the NFL, Nikon, Sony Playstation, and WebMD. In his role at UTA he has harnessed that experience to help celebrity clients launch exciting new brands, such as Born and Bred vodka for Channing Tatum, EBY for Sofia Vergara, and Houseplant for Seth Rogen.
